text:
e="preserve">James Patrick Otis (March 16, 1948 – March 3, 2020) was an American actor. He was born in Stamford, Connecticut. Otis began his career in the 1970s. His first movie role was in "Dragonfly". On television, he was known for his role in "Profiler".
In 1999, Otis appeared in three episodes of '. In 2006, Otis appeared in the true story movie "The Black Dahlia". Otis also appeared in "The Prestige".
Otis died in Stamford on March 3, 2020 at the age of 71.
